The add-on starts collecting data with a published date later than this time (UTC in ISO 8601 format: "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ"). Default is 30 days before the current time.

element.name: end_date
element.label: End Time
element.key: The add-on stops collecting data with a published date up to but excluding this time (UTC in ISO 8601 format: "YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSSZ"). Default is empty which means the add-on will continue to collect all new events.
